transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom'! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Grown-ups drive me.
🛣️ I go on the road.
⛽ I need gas to go!

transport.question: I float on the water. Toot toot! What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm bigger than a duck!
⚓ I can take you to an island.
🚢 People travel on me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you can pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You might wear a helmet when riding me.
🔔 I have a bell to ring!
🦵 You use your legs to make me go.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I'm bigger than a bird.
💺 You sit down inside of me.
✈️ I have wings!

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take lots of kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing lights when I stop.
🎒 I pick up children in the morning.
🚦 I follow a special route.

transport.question: I drive on tracks and carry lots of people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🛤️ I travel on metal rails.
📣 You can hear my whistle.
🚝 I can be very long.

transport.question: I help put out fires and have a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I am usually red.
🔥 I spray water.
👨‍🚒 Brave people drive me.

transport.question: I help people who are sick or hurt, and my siren goes 'wee-ooh wee-ooh'! What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a cross on my side.
🤕 I take people to the hospital.
🧑‍⚕️ Doctors and nurses ride in me.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
⚕️ Sometimes I help rescue people.
⏫ My blades make a 'whup whup' sound.

transport.question: I go very fast into space and explore new worlds. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I'm very tall and pointy.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🪐 I go past the clouds and stars.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and cold. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm made of tiny ice crystals.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves to play with me!

weather.question: I come after the rain and sometimes I have pretty colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I look like a colorful arch.
☀️ The sun needs to be shining for me to appear.
💧 I'm made of light shining through raindrops.

weather.question: I'm hot and bright, and I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give you warmth.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ You need an umbrella when I fall.
💧 I am made of water.
☔ Sometimes I come down very hard in a storm.

weather.question: I'm big and white and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I can be fluffy or dark.
🐑 Sometimes I look like animals.
🌫️ I can block the sun.

weather.question: I make the leaves dance in the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 I can help you fly a kite.
🍃 I make windmills turn.

weather.question: I’m water that turns to ice when it’s very cold. I can hurt if I fall on you. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am a solid.
🤕 Sometimes I fall during thunderstorms.
⚾ I can be different sizes.

weather.question: I'm a big storm with strong winds that spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can be very dangerous.
🏠 You should stay inside when I come.
🌀 I look like a spinning column of air.

weather.question: I'm a type of precipitation that is part rain and part snow. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am icy.
🌨️ I am colder than rain but not as cold as snow.
❄️ I am a mixture of rain and snow.

weather.question: I'm a storm with lots of thunder and lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am LOUD!
☔️ It's a good idea to be inside during me.
⛈️ I have rain and can have hail.
